price: Hai orang-orang yang beriman, taatlah kepada Allah dan rasul-Nya, dan janganlah kamu berpaling dari-Nya, sedang kamu mendengar (perintah-perintah-Nya),
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَلَا تَوَلَّوۡاْ عَنۡهُ وَأَنتُمۡ تَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū aṭīʿū al-laha warasūlahu walā tawallaw ʿanhu wa-antum tasmaʿūna
